name: Hot Tracks: Cars
description:
Want to prove yourself on the track? See how fast you can finish in this new game Hot Tracks! Race around three maps and earn money to buy yourself new cars.

Instructions:

Drive your car to the finish line as fast as you can while collecting money on the way. Driving off the track will cause you to restart the level so careful how you drive.  Only losers drive off the track!


Controls:

W - Accelerate forward

S -  Reverse

A - Steer Left

D - Steer Right

Space Bar - Brake

Left/Right Arrow - change songs 

Remember to rate the game and donate if possible so I can continue making fun games! Comment below your fastest time on all three maps. Let's have ourselves a friendly competition!  Ready, Set, Drive!
